channel.title: Need Some Help With Adding A Shop Only For Donors
channel.description:
Well see, i want a shop that every one can see (look in to) but only donors can buy from i have no idea how to add some like that but maybe you guys no how.
Contact Me If you Can Help Me Out: Skype stingray21212 email adrian.morgan015@yahoo.com

item.title: Need Some Help With Adding A Shop Only For Donors
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

find the variable that determines a donator… then in actionhandler where you open the shop.

if (c.isdonator) {
c.getShops().openShop(id);
}

or it could be like

if (c.isdonator >= 1) {
c.getShops().openShop(id);
}

edit: didnt read full post…

in the shophandler, or shopassistant (forgot which)

find the buyitem method

if (c.myShopId = shopid && !c.isDonator) {
c.sendMessage("You have to donate to buy from this shop);
return;
}

^ somthing like this but variable naming and methods will prob be different depending on your source.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help With Adding A Shop Only For Donors
